song.title: The Deadline tune #3 (Demo tune 10) remix
song.info: I decided to compose a remix of the Demo Tune 10 as it seems to named :) It's one tune of the The Deadline demo ( 2nd part music) released by Finnish Gold. This is my first touch for C-64 music since 1990, so I've been out the scene 25 years:) time flies.... I played quitar and bass lines and for drums used Ez Drummer. Original C-64 lines are spiced with some effects like Reverb, Delay, Wah and Chorus. Enjoy and feel free to comment! Cheers!
